text: The discography for American country music singer Carrie Underwood consists of 7 studio albums. ==Albums== ===Studio albums=== Year Album details 2005 Some Hearts * Release date: November 15, 2005 * Label: Arista Nashville 2007 Carnival Ride * Release date: October 23, 2007 * Label: Arista Nashville 2009 Play On * Release date: November 3, 2009 * Label: Arista Nashville 2012 Blown Away * Release date: May 1, 2012 * Label: Arista Nashville 2015 Storyteller * Release date: October 23, 2015 * Label: Arista Nashville 2018 Cry Pretty * Release date: September 14, 2018 * Label: Capitol Nashville 2022 Denim & Rhinestones * Release date: June 10, 2022 * Label: Capitol Nashville ==Other album appearances== Year Song Album 2010 "You're Lookin' at Country" Coal Miner's Daughter: A Tribute to Loretta Lynn 2019 "Alone" Live in Atlantic City "Barracuda" ==References== Category:Discographies
title: Carrie Underwood discography
